statements: SELECT * FROM kpi_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, on_time_delivery_rate FROM kpi_reports WHERE order_fulfillment_rate > 0.8;
SELECT report_id, order_fulfillment_rate FROM kpi_reports WHERE on_time_delivery_rate < 0.9 ORDER BY order_fulfillment_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM kpi_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND report_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT report_id, on_time_delivery_rate, order_fulfillment_rate FROM kpi_reports WHERE on_time_delivery_rate < 0.8 OR order_fulfillment_rate < 0.8 ORDER BY report_id ASC;
SELECT report_id, on_time_delivery_rate, order_fulfillment_rate, report_date FROM kpi_reports;
SELECT * FROM kpi_reports WHERE on_time_delivery_rate > 0.8;
SELECT report_id, order_fulfillment_rate FROM kpi_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT AVG(on_time_delivery_rate) AS avg_on_time_delivery_rate, MAX(order_fulfillment_rate) AS max_order_fulfillment_rate FROM kpi_reports;
SELECT report_id, order_fulfillment_rate FROM kpi_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM on_time_deliveries;
SELECT order_id, delivery_status FROM on_time_deliveries WHERE order_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM order_fulfillment_rates ORDER BY fulfillment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(fulfillment_rate) AS total_fulfillment_rate FROM order_fulfillment_rates GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT order_id, delivery_status, delivery_date FROM on_time_deliveries WHERE customer_id = 500 ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT order_id, delivery_date, customer_id, delivery_status FROM on_time_deliveries;
SELECT order_id, delivery_status, customer_id, delivery_date FROM on_time_deliveries ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, delivery_status, delivery_date FROM on_time_deliveries WHERE delivery_status = 'Delayed';
SELECT o.order_id, o.delivery_status, r.fulfillment_rate FROM on_time_deliveries o JOIN order_fulfillment_rates r ON o.order_id = r.order_id;

SELECT o.order_id, o.customer_id, r.fulfillment_rate, r.fulfillment_date FROM on_time_deliveries o JOIN order_fulfillment_rates r ON o.order_id = r.order_id WHERE r.fulfillment_rate > 90 ORDER BY r.fulfillment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Reports;
SELECT report_name, delivery_rate FROM Reports;
SELECT report_name, fulfillment_rate FROM Reports WHERE delivery_rate > 0.8;
SELECT order_id, delivery_date, delivery_status FROM Deliveries ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT report_id, report_name, delivery_rate, fulfillment_rate FROM Reports WHERE delivery_rate < 0.5 AND fulfillment_rate > 0.8;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date, delivery_status FROM Deliveries WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY delivery_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Reports r INNER JOIN Orders o ON r.report_id = o.report_id WHERE r.report_name LIKE 'Sales%' AND o.total_amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) as num_orders FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(order_id) > 2 ORDER BY num_orders DESC;
SELECT * FROM on_time_deliveries WHERE delivered_on_time = TRUE;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date FROM on_time_deliveries ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, delivery_date, delivered_on_time FROM on_time_deliveries WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM order_fulfillment WHERE fulfillment_percentage > 90;
SELECT order_id, fulfillment_date FROM order_fulfillment WHERE customer_id = 456 ORDER BY fulfillment_date;
SELECT * FROM on_time_deliveries WHERE delivered_on_time = TRUE;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM order_fulfillment ORDER BY fulfillment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, fulfillment_rate FROM order_performance WHERE fulfillment_rate >= 0.8;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date, courier_id FROM delivery_performance WHERE on_time_performance < 0.5;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, fulfillment_percentage FROM order_fulfillment WHERE fulfillment_percentage > 0.8 ORDER BY fulfillment_percentage ASC;
SELECT * FROM deliveries ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT recipient_name, delivery_status FROM deliveries WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Pending' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM deliveries WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT recipient_name, delivery_date FROM deliveries WHERE delivery_status = 'In Transit' ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Completed' AND total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_category ASC, product_name DESC;
